isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 2000 4000 and 8000 MODELS BUILT OCTOBER 1, 1998 AND AFTER - ALLISON WT TRANSMISSION WITH WTEC III ELECTRONIC CONTROLS - ELECTRICAL OPERATION - DATA LINK CONNECTOR (384)

svcproc.title: DATA LINK CONNECTOR (384)
svcproc.para: A redundant diagnostics connector is no longer located on the transmission, however, the fault codes can still be read through the vehicle J-1587 data link connector (384) located at the left kick panel.
Data link connector cavities (A) and (B) are the positive and negative serial communications links that enable the DDR to read diagnostic codes from the ECU (634) by way of circuits 142 and 151.
